name: Crazy Police
description:
An old atari 2600 classic comes back to life. OMG;)

Final Version is Release!!!

Try to catch the criminal 3 times.

Base on the classic Busy Police, also called

Keystone Kapers published 1983.

Ever wanted to be a "Kop"? Crazy Police gives you a chance at just that, putting you in control of Officer Kelly who is in hot pursuit of Harry Hooligan in this fun platform game from Activision. The game is a great police chase.

****Features:****

Random level: every time you start the game the experience is different.

beautiful retro graphics and character animation

random levels

special items

three controls schemes.

****Operating methods*****

First control: left arrow and right arrow for running. Button down for duck and touch right for jumping and middle for shooting

I am an indie developer from Vienna. I hope you like my game. Enjoy it.
